entry.title: Sankey Plots with Python
entry.summary:
Description

Speaker:: Daniel Ringler

Track: PyData: Visualization This talk provides an introduction to Sankey plots with a focus on creating them with various Python libraries. We will talk about the pros and cons of the libraries, give practical advice on how and when to use them, and what you should …
entry.content:
Description

Speaker:: Daniel Ringler

Track: PyData: Visualization This talk provides an introduction to Sankey plots with a focus on creating them with various Python libraries. We will talk about the pros and cons of the libraries, give practical advice on how and when to use them, and what you should regard when creating Sankey plots yourself.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2022 conference, April 11-13 2022. https://2022.pycon.de More details at the conference page: https://2022.pycon.de/program/7SFQNW Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconde

entry.title: How to choose better colors for your data visualizations
entry.summary:
Description

Speaker: Daniel Ringler

Track:PyData Everybody is doing colorful charts with Python libraries such as matplotlib and bokeh but most people never change the basic configuration. This talk will teach you the basics of color theory to help you choose the right colors of your charts.

Recorded at the …
entry.content:
Description

Speaker: Daniel Ringler

Track:PyData Everybody is doing colorful charts with Python libraries such as matplotlib and bokeh but most people never change the basic configuration. This talk will teach you the basics of color theory to help you choose the right colors of your charts.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference. https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/QE3UUQ Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconde
